name: Revenge of the Slimes (Crease)
description:
This is a demo of a turn-based RPG where slimes and cats defeat humans to to take control of the world! This is an entry to NovaLiminal's Chill Vibes Game Jam.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to navigate UI

Enter/Return to interact/continue

Backspace to go back

Notes:
-You may have to press Enter/Return to proceed with dialogue an extra time or 2 sometimes due to a bug (will fix this later)

-Please be gentle with the Enter/Return key, it appears a few bugs can be discovered this way... ^^;;
